name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Business identifier for this medication.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Business identifier for this medication.

name: $code
desc: Returns: A code that specifies this medication, or a textual description if no code is available. Usage note: This could be a standard medication code such as a code from RxNorm, SNOMED CT, IDMP etc. It could also be a national or local formulary code, optionally with translations to other code systems.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code that specifies this medication, or a textual description if no code is available. Usage note: This could be a standard medication code such as a code from RxNorm, SNOMED CT, IDMP etc. It could also be a national or local formulary code, optionally

name: $status
desc: Returns: A code to indicate if the medication is in active use.  The status refers to the validity about the information of the medication and not to its medicinal properties.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A code to indicate if the medication is in active use.  The status refers to the validity about the information of the medication and not to its medicinal properties.

name: $manufacturer
desc: Returns: Describes the details of the manufacturer of the medication product.  This is not intended to represent the distributor of a medication product.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Describes the details of the manufacturer of the medication product.  This is not intended to represent the distributor of a medication product.

name: $doseForm
desc: Returns: Describes the form of the item.  Powder; tablets; capsule.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Describes the form of the item.  Powder; tablets; capsule.

name: $amount
desc: Returns: Specific amount of the drug in the packaged product.  For example, when specifying a product that has the same strength (For example, Insulin glargine 100 unit per mL solution for injection), this attribute provides additional clarification of the package amount (For example, 3 mL, 10mL, etc.).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Specific amount of the drug in the packaged product.  For example, when specifying a product that has the same strength (For example, Insulin glargine 100 unit per mL solution for injection), this attribute provides additional clarification of the package

name: $synonym
desc: Returns: Additional names for a medication, for example, the name(s) given to a medication in different countries.  For example, acetaminophen and paracetamol or salbutamol and albuterol.

name: $addsynonym
desc: Additional names for a medication, for example, the name(s) given to a medication in different countries.  For example, acetaminophen and paracetamol or salbutamol and albuterol.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Additional names for a medication, for example, the name(s) given to a medication in different countries.  For example, acetaminophen and paracetamol or salbutamol and albuterol.

name: $relatedMedicationKnowledge
desc: Returns: Associated or related knowledge about a medication.

name: $addrelatedMedicationKnowledge
desc: Associated or related knowledge about a medication.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Associated or related knowledge about a medication.

name: $associatedMedication
desc: Returns: Associated or related medications.  For example, if the medication is a branded product (e.g. Crestor), this is the Therapeutic Moeity (e.g. Rosuvastatin) or if this is a generic medication (e.g. Rosuvastatin), this would link to a branded product (e.g. Crestor).

name: $addassociatedMedication
desc: Associated or related medications.  For example, if the medication is a branded product (e.g. Crestor), this is the Therapeutic Moeity (e.g. Rosuvastatin) or if this is a generic medication (e.g. Rosuvastatin), this would link to a branded product (e.g. Crestor).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Associated or related medications.  For example, if the medication is a branded product (e.g. Crestor), this is the Therapeutic Moeity (e.g. Rosuvastatin) or if this is a generic medication (e.g. Rosuvastatin), this would link to a branded product (e.g. C

name: $productType
desc: Returns: Category of the medication or product (e.g. branded product, therapeutic moeity, generic product, innovator product, etc.).

name: $addproductType
desc: Category of the medication or product (e.g. branded product, therapeutic moeity, generic product, innovator product, etc.).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Category of the medication or product (e.g. branded product, therapeutic moeity, generic product, innovator product, etc.).

name: $monograph
desc: Returns: Associated documentation about the medication.

name: $addmonograph
desc: Associated documentation about the medication.

name: $ingredient
desc: Returns: Identifies a particular constituent of interest in the product.

name: $addingredient
desc: Identifies a particular constituent of interest in the product.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies a particular constituent of interest in the product.

name: $device
desc: Returns: A device associated with the medication (for example, a drug coated catheter or a drug impregnated dressing).

name: $adddevice
desc: A device associated with the medication (for example, a drug coated catheter or a drug impregnated dressing).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A device associated with the medication (for example, a drug coated catheter or a drug impregnated dressing).

name: $preparationInstruction
desc: Returns: The instructions for preparing the medication.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The instructions for preparing the medication.

name: $intendedRoute
desc: Returns: The intended or approved route of administration.

name: $addintendedRoute
desc: The intended or approved route of administration.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The intended or approved route of administration.

name: $cost
desc: Returns: The price of the medication.

name: $addcost
desc: The price of the medication.

name: $monitoringProgram
desc: Returns: The program under which the medication is reviewed.

name: $addmonitoringProgram
desc: The program under which the medication is reviewed.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The program under which the medication is reviewed.

name: $administrationGuideline
desc: Returns: Guidelines or protocols that are applicable for the administration of the medication.

name: $addadministrationGuideline
desc: Guidelines or protocols that are applicable for the administration of the medication.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Guidelines or protocols that are applicable for the administration of the medication.

name: $medicineClassification
desc: Returns: Categorization of the medication within a formulary or classification system.

name: $addmedicineClassification
desc: Categorization of the medication within a formulary or classification system.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Categorization of the medication within a formulary or classification system.

name: $packaging
desc: Returns: Information that only applies to packages (not products).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Information that only applies to packages (not products).

name: $drugCharacteristic
desc: Returns: Specifies descriptive properties of the medicine, such as color, shape, imprints, etc.

name: $adddrugCharacteristic
desc: Specifies descriptive properties of the medicine, such as color, shape, imprints, etc.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Specifies descriptive properties of the medicine, such as color, shape, imprints, etc.

name: $clinicalUseIssue
desc: Returns: Potential clinical issue with or between medication(s) (for example, drug-drug interaction, drug-disease contraindication, drug-allergy interaction, etc.).

name: $addclinicalUseIssue
desc: Potential clinical issue with or between medication(s) (for example, drug-drug interaction, drug-disease contraindication, drug-allergy interaction, etc.).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Potential clinical issue with or between medication(s) (for example, drug-drug interaction, drug-disease contraindication, drug-allergy interaction, etc.).

name: $regulatory
desc: Returns: Regulatory information about a medication.

name: $addregulatory
desc: Regulatory information about a medication.

name: $kineticCharacteristic
desc: Returns: The time course of drug absorption, distribution, metabolism and excretion of a medication from the body.

name: $addkineticCharacteristic
desc: The time course of drug absorption, distribution, metabolism and excretion of a medication from the body.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The time course of drug absorption, distribution, metabolism and excretion of a medication from the body.
